# dailypotus

A simple set of functions for scraping Wikipedia-based timelines/daily happenings of American Presidencies 45 & 46.  Daily event data have been structured for a uniform output.


```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("jaytimm/dailypotus")
```


## Trump timeline

```{r}
djt <- dailypotus::daily_wiki_trump()
```


> 45's last day:

```{r}
djt |>
  dplyr::select(-weekof, -daypres, -dow) |>
  dplyr::filter(date == max(date)) |>
  knitr::kable() 
```


## Biden timeline


```{r}
jrb <- dailypotus::daily_wiki_biden()
```


> 46's first day:

```{r}
jrb |>
  dplyr::select(-weekof, -daypres, -dow) |>
  dplyr::filter(date == min(date)) |>
  knitr::kable() 
```
